replies.body: This is really great, looking forward to ocean week.
marauder ashe is going on sale? even though shes gonna be on sale in the february sales next month?

When this sale list was created, February sales weren't yet decided. So for the Ocean Week Sale we chose skins that hadn't been on sale in a while and would not be on regular sale in January. Naturally this included skins that could also possibly go on global sale in later months but we couldn't be sure at the time.

Heads up, ARAM Battle Boost sale schedule didn't work as intended so it had to be manually activated. It is working now.
If you purchased a Battle Boost on 30th Jan between 00:00 and 01:30 AEDT and it was full price (125 RP), you'll automatically be getting 63 RP back to your account within 48 hours.
trying to fit all the champions of the free rotation slot on the old client launcher haha
